name: Bowser X Peach: Superstar Sexting Android version
name_original: Bowser X Peach: Superstar Sexting Android version
description:
This game is now playable on your android phone. Now it really feels like your girlfriend is cheating on you!

To play it, just download  it on your phone, and install the app. It may be a bit challenging to get your phone to allow the install, but you can figure out how to turn on permissions, depending on your phone. Personally, it was no problem for me.

The number in the bottom right of the snapchat menu is the text speed. Remember, 5 is slowest, 1 is fastest.
